sections.title: Symptoms
content: • I would like to understand how product restoration works.

sections.title: Cause
content: App users on iOS need to type in their Apple password to restore purchases, it is required to provide a button to restore purchases, and a method which calls the RestoreTransactions method of the IAppleExtensions.
App users on Android will not need to do anything, Android will handle it for you automatically.

sections.title: Resolution
content: You can read more about restoring transactions on iOS here and here. You can also see an example method here.
